targets.query:
from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upper_pressure_N2" or r["_field"] == "upper_pressure_Ar")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lower_pressure_N2" or r["_field"] == "lower_pressure_Ar")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /IR2_array_temp[1-6]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /IR2_array_temp[1-6]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "IR1_ref")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "IR2_ref")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "top_setpoint" or r["_field"] == "bot_setpoint")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "top_timestamp" or r["_field"] == "bot_timestamp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upper_pressure_N2" or r["_field"] == "upper_pressure_Ar")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /IR1_array_temp[0-9]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /IR1_array_temp[0-9]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /IR1_array_temp[0-9]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "lower_pressure_N2" or r["_field"] == "lower_pressure_Ar")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /IR2_array_temp[0-9]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /IR2_array_temp[0-9]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /IR2_array_temp[0-9]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10s, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /top_TC[0-9]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "top_setpoint")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /bot_TC[0-9]/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bot_setpoint")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "max")

from(bucket: "prototype-zero")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "liner_heater")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /^(top|bot)_PID/)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: r._value*(100.0/255.0)}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
